vote.question: On the Cloture Motion
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Nomination of Walter David Counts, III, of Texas, to be United States District Judge for the Western District of Texas.

vote.question: On the Nomination
vote.title: Confirmation Michael Lawrence Brown, of Georgia, to be United States District Judge for the Northern District of Georgia

vote.question: On the Cloture Motion
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture: Michael Lawrence Brown, of Georgia, to be U.S. District Judge for the Northern District of Georgia

vote.question: On the Nomination
vote.title: Confirmation Thomas Lee Robinson Parker, of Tennessee, to be U.S. District Judge for the Western District of Tennessee

vote.question: On the Cloture Motion
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture: Thomas Lee Robinson Parker to be U.S. District Judge for the Western District of Tennessee

vote.question: On the Nomination
vote.title: Confirmation William L. Campbell, Jr., of Tennessee, to be U.S. District Judge for the Middle District of Tennessee

vote.question: On the Cloture Motion
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture: William L. Campbell, Jr., to be a U.S. Circuit Judge for the Middle District of Tennessee

vote.question: On the Nomination
vote.title: Confirmation John C. Rood, of Arizona, to be Under Secretary of Defense for Policy
